title: Curecanti National Recreation Area: Nature
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature             Nature        While the largest body of water in Colorado is within Curecanti, there are a variety of ecosystems here besidesBlue Mesa Reservoir. Curecanti also hosts riparian habitats, steep canyons, and areas of ponderosa pine, Douglasfir and aspen. NPS Photos by Lisa Lynch       Animals » Plants » Natural Features & Ecosystems »
